Class KnowledgeSystem

java.lang.Object
model.KnowledgeSystem
public class KnowledgeSystem extends Object
This is the controller class, the class is encharged of conecting the frontend with the backend

      public boolean isProjectsFull()
      Checks if there is room for more projects
      Returns:
      true if there is a position where a proejct can be added, otherwise false.

      Check if there is a projects created.
      Returns:

      public String[] phaseNamesInAProject(int projectNumber)
      Saves all the names of the phases of a project
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - index of the project whom names of the phases wants to get.
      Returns:
      Name of the phases of an specific project.

    • hasAProjectEndend

      public boolean hasAProjectEndend(int projectNumber)
      It checks if all the project phases are false and if they are it says that the project has ended.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - the index of the project to check
      Returns:
      true if the project has ended otherwise false

    • endProjectInformation

      public String endProjectInformation(int projectNumber)
      This method gets the information of the las phase of the project and it is used when a project has culminated.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - index of the project
      Returns:
      a String containing the information of the last phase of the project

    • addManager

      public void addManager(String name, String phone, int projectNumber)
      It gets the infotmation fo the name,phone and the index of the project and sends it to the respective project in order to crate a manager.
      Parameters:
      name - Manager's name
      phone - Manager's phone number
      projectNumber - The number of the Project

    • employeesInAProject

      public String[] employeesInAProject(int projectNumber)
      Returns an array containing information about the employees working in a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - the number of the project to get the employees from.
      Returns:
      an array containing information about the employees working in the project, or an empty string if there are no employees in the project.

    • addProject

      public void addProject(String projectName, String clientName, double projectBudget)
      Adds a new Project to the Projects array
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the Project
      clientName - The name of the Client
      projectBudget - The budget allocated for the Project

    • findProject

      public int findProject(String name)
      Searches for a Project with a given name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Project to search for
      Returns:
      The index of the Project in the Projects array, or -1 if not found

      Initializes the phases of a Project
      Parameters:
      actualDate - The actual date
      phaseIndex - The index of the Phase
      amountMonthsBetweenProjects - The amount of months between phases
      projectNumber - The number of the Project

    • endPhase

      public void endPhase(int projectNumber)

      Parameters:

    • addCapsule

      public String addCapsule(int projectNumber, String capsuleType, String description, int employeeNumber, String learnings)
      Adds a new Capsule to a Phase in a Project
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - The index of the Project
      capsuleType - The type of the Capsule
      description - The description of the Capsule
      employeeNumber - The index of the Employee that created the Capsule
      learnings - The learnings from the Capsule
      Returns:
      A message about the status of the Capsule creation

    • getCapsulesInfo

      public String getCapsulesInfo(int projectNumber)
      Returns information about the first valid capsule in the current phase of the given project, including its description and hashtags.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - the index of the project to get the capsule information from
      Returns:
      a string with the description and hashtags of the first valid capsule in the current phase of the project
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the project number is invalid

    • hasHashWords

      public boolean hasHashWords(String text)
      Checks if a given text contains at least one hashtag word.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to check for hashtags
      Returns:
      true if the text contains at least one hashtag word, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the Capsule to approve
      projectNumber - The index of the Project
      Returns:
      A message about the status of the Capsule approval

      Parameters:

      projectNumber - The index of the Project
      Returns:

    • amountCapsulesByType

      public int amountCapsulesByType(int projectIndex, String capsuleType)
      Returns the amount of capsules of a specific type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectIndex - The index of the project.
      capsuleType - The type of capsule to count.
      Returns:
      The amount of capsules of the specified type in the project.

    • learningsInAPhase

      public String learningsInAPhase(int projectIndex, int phaseIndex)
      Retrieves the list of learnings in a specific phase of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectIndex - The index of the project.
      phaseIndex - The index of the phase.
      Returns:
      The list of learnings in the specified phase of the project, or a message indicating that there are no learnings.

    • projectWithTheMostAmountOfCapsules

      public String projectWithTheMostAmountOfCapsules()
      Retrieves the name of the project with the most amount of capsules registered.
      Returns:
      The name of the project with the most amount of capsules registered.

    • capsulesOfAnEmployee

      public String capsulesOfAnEmployee(String employeeName)
      Retrieves the list of capsules written by an employee in all projects.
      Parameters:
      employeeName - The name of the employee.
      Returns:
      The list of capsules written by the specified employee in all projects.

    • InformLearningsOfCapsulesByHastag

      public String InformLearningsOfCapsulesByHastag(String query)
      Retrieves the list of learnings in all projects that match a given hashtag query.
      Parameters:
      query - The hashtag query to search for.
      Returns:
      The list of learnings in all projects that match the given hashtag query.
